channel.title: Blogs on Paul-Razvan Sarbu
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Paul-Razvan Sarbu

item.title: Recreating Apple's iOS Wallet Animations with Flutter and Dart
item.description: In the world of mobile development, animations can make or break user experience. Inspired by the sleek animations in Apple’s iOS Wallet, I embarked on a journey to replicate them using Flutter and Dart.

item.title: Better Forms
item.description: iSurvey In a world dominated by platforms like Survey Monkey, Qualtrics, and Microsoft Forms, each with its own strengths and weaknesses, there’s room for innovation. Enter iSurvey, a project designed to empower survey authors and enhance the data collection process.

item.title: Six Sigma - Part Two
item.description: Unlocking Advanced Customizations in Power BI with Deneb and VEGA Lite Power BI’s default Scatter Plot visual is robust but lacks some advanced customization features, such as the use of SVGs for better data representation.

item.title: Six Sigma - Part One
item.description: Abusing Excel: Streamlining Six Sigma Time Studies" In late 2022, I was tasked with preparing forms for Six Sigma time studies. Traditional methods involved pen and paper, followed by manual data entry into Excelâ€”a laborious and error-prone process.

item.title: Power Platform
item.description: In December 2021, the Onboard Cabin Report (OCR) underwent a significant update. The categories were expanded to a five-level hierarchical taxonomy, allowing crew members to pre-classify the OCRs.

item.title: Automating the Onboard Cabin Report: A Machine Learning Approach
item.description: Onboard Cabin Reports Classification using ML When I joined the Guest Delivery team, now known as Inflight Service & Hospitality, I quickly noticed an over-reliance on Excel.

item.title: Rediscovering My Passion for Coding: A Journey from Line Manager to Data Analyst
item.description: Note that the data in the chart above is fictional Although I graduated from an IT high school in 2001 with a focus on Junior Analysis and Programming, I didn’t fully immerse myself in the tech world until 2016.
